string.value: Manji, who has received Mu Young's messages, seems to have a favor to ask of you.
Manji has asked that you deliver his request to Mu Young, who is currently in the Underground Temple inside the dungeon. Let's deliver Manji's request to Mu Young.

Manji has asked that you deliver his request to Mu Young, who is in the Underground Temple inside the dungeon. Upon receiving Manji's request, Mu Young promised himself that he would always remain mindful of his master's request.

string.name: summary
string.value: Let's go find Mu Young, who is in the Underground Temple in the central dungeon of Victoria.

It says here that you've been of great help to Mu Young. I knew you were far superior to many others who claim to be adventurers. Please let Mu Young know I understand. And if you ever go back to the dungeon, could you also tell him that I...

Please tell him that he must stay alert every single second or else he'll be consumed by Balrog's evil forces. Balrog may have disappeared for now, but he will come back when you least expect it. Tell him to be prepared.
Do you have other places to go? Are you going to Ossyria or something?

Oh! You're back! Did you give my master the message?

#b#L0#Yup. And Manji also wanted me to tell you something.#l
#k

What is it?

#b#L0#He said to stay alert at all times because Balrog is an evil creature.#l
#k
I will keep that in mind. I'll always remind myself so I don't forget. Thank you so much for coming back to tell me that.
I'd love to see you from time to time. I'm going to stay in here and continue with my investigation, but if you're ever nearby, please feel free to visit.
Please tell Mu Young at the underground temple what I've told you.
